articles.content: In the early 1990s, Micro Labs observed that the paracetamol 500 mg market was crowded and needed disruption. After several rounds of market research and discussions with doctors, the company found a… [+5710 chars]

articles.author: HT Correspondent
articles.title: Delhi added 3 dengue cases in last week of January - Hindustan Times
articles.description: As per the records, Delhi had zero dengue cases in January 2021 and 2020; one case in 2019; six cases in 2018 and four dengue cases in 2017. | Latest News Delhi
articles.content: The national capital reported three more dengue cases in the week ending January 31, taking the total number of dengue infections this month to 23 -- the highest January tally in at least the past fi… [+927 chars]
